rooms.title: The Entrance
rooms.description: You are standing in the hallway to 1510 Shrader St. This is Theresa's house.

rooms.title: The Hallway
rooms.description: You are still in the hallway.

rooms.title: The Hallway
rooms.description: You are still in the hallway. A stink emanates from the bathroom to the east.

rooms.title: The Hallway
rooms.description: You are at the end of the hallway. The kitchen is to the west, and a bedroom to the north. A shower is running to the east.

rooms.title: Lori's Room
rooms.description: This is Lori's room. It's a mess.

rooms.title: The Kitchen
rooms.description: A pot of milk is warming on the stove. Someone is making cheese!

rooms.title: The Pantry
rooms.description: The pantry is full of canned goods. Better not eat those just yet.

rooms.title: Theresa's Room
rooms.description: This is a bedroom. It is clean and tidy. What a nice place.

rooms.title: The Living Room
rooms.description: The TV blares Doctor Who in the corner, and the couch is occupied by a pile of dirty clothes. Probably Lori's.

rooms.title: The Bathroom
rooms.description: The shower is running and a voice yodels from behind the curtain. Better not disturb them.

rooms.title: The Toilet
rooms.description: A massive stink permeates the air. The window is closed, keeping the stink inside.

rooms.title: The Closet
rooms.description: This closet is built for midgets. Tall people need not apply.
